org.inf.personneldatabase.reports

Class PrivateAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.inf.personneldatabase.reports.PrivateAccessor

  • public class PrivateAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to private members in classes.
    See Also:
    Subverting Java Access Protection for Unit Testing

      • getPrivateField

        public static java.lang.Object getPrivateField(java.lang.Object o,
                               java.lang.String fieldName)
        Gets the private field.
        Parameters:
        o - the private Object you like to access
        fieldName - the field name
        Returns:
        the private field

      • setPrivateField

        public static java.lang.Boolean setPrivateField(java.lang.Object o,
                                java.lang.String fieldName,
                                java.lang.Object newValue)
        Sets the private field.
        Parameters:
        o - the private Object you like to access
        fieldName - the field name
        newValue - the new value for the private Object
        Returns:
        true when the private Object was updated, false if the Object was not found
